last_episode_to_air.name: Tradition
last_episode_to_air.overview: For Justin, celebrating tradition includes some enchanting etiquette at a formal dinner party and breaking illusions out of a birthday piñata.

name: Magic for Humans
overview: From baffling people on the street to orchestrating elaborate tricks, Justin Willman blends good-natured magic with grown-up laughs.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: From baffling people on the street to orchestrating elaborate tricks, Justin Willman blends good-natured magic with grown-up laughs.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Hilarious and heartfelt, Justin Willman pulls out all the stops and props to amaze real people with playful tricks and showstopping magic routines.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: He’s back to pull a rabbit out of a ... piñata? Justin Willman always surprises with frisky magic skills that amuse and charm, trick and disarm.

episodes.name: Self Control
episodes.overview: Justin explores the concepts of marshmallow self-control and why it's best just to go with the flow. Plus -- free fro-yo!

episodes.name: Express Yourself
episodes.overview: School uniforms. Latte art. LEGO sculptures. Justin tackles the surprisingly magical ways people choose to express themselves.

episodes.name: Terrifying Tech
episodes.overview: It's man vs. machine as Justin squares off against a robot in a magic battle. Other topics include delivery drones, face yoga and virtual reality.

episodes.name: Seeing Is Believing
episodes.overview: Justin attempts to convince people that invisibility, brain-enhancing medicines and superpowers are all real. (Spoiler alert: They're not!)

episodes.name: Guilt Trip
episodes.overview: Oh, the guilt! Justin talks to moms about lying for a living. Later, he conducts an eyewitness experiment and amazes detention-stricken students.

episodes.name: Love
episodes.overview: In this episode dedicated to romance, Justin helps a single guy get a date and delivers a surprise proposal to a woman who married herself.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: From baffling people on the street to orchestrating elaborate tricks, Justin Willman blends good-natured magic with grown-up laughs.

episodes.name: Christmas
episodes.overview: Ho ho ho! Justin embraces the holiday spirit and visits Santa school, gets playful with Susan Sarandon and teaches kids about the magic of giving.

episodes.name: Fake
episodes.overview: It's all about suspending disbelief when Justin links TV magic to pro wrestling, fools a lie detector and role-plays a fantasy mage in the park.

episodes.name: Daddy Issues
episodes.overview: Between bad dad jokes, Justin pulls pranks with his son, awes parents with his uncanny childproofing and tests his reflexes against the LA Chargers.

episodes.name: We Should Talk
episodes.overview: Communication is key as Justin plays language games in an ESL class and conducts psychic readings at a library. Plus: starstruck subliminal messages.

episodes.name: All Work and No Play
episodes.overview: After telecommuting via a handy TaskRabbit helper, Justin amazes kids with tricks for skipping chores and performs a feat of dazzling multitasking.

episodes.name: Time Is Relative
episodes.overview: Justin turns water into mead at the Renaissance fair and speed-knits a sweater before slowing down to share magical memories with his mother.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Hilarious and heartfelt, Justin Willman pulls out all the stops and props to amaze real people with playful tricks and showstopping magic routines.

episodes.name: Power Trip
episodes.overview: Magic can influence the influencers and convince people they feel things they don't. But it can also teach children about the power of positive words.

episodes.name: Vices
episodes.overview: Embracing naughty habits, Justin magically figures out who’s high, hustles kids with broccoli and visits a rage room.

episodes.name: Home
episodes.overview: After conjuring the ideal house pet in a cat cafe, Justin tackles his greatest challenge yet by assembling Ikea furniture — only to end up in pieces.

episodes.name: Self Care
episodes.overview: Seeking a little “me” time, Justin indulges in a mystical massage, struts his superhuman strength at the gym and convinces socks to fold themselves.

episodes.name: The End
episodes.overview: Justin ponders the end of it all while giving life to a thrift store's expired items and turning kids' dreams of the future into a real bucket list.

episodes.name: Know Fear
episodes.overview: Justin bares his worst nightmare as he strips down to perform at a nudist ranch, then conquers his fear of spicy foods with a few red-hot card tricks.

episodes.name: Tradition
episodes.overview: For Justin, celebrating tradition includes some enchanting etiquette at a formal dinner party and breaking illusions out of a birthday piñata.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: He’s back to pull a rabbit out of a ... piñata? Justin Willman always surprises with frisky magic skills that amuse and charm, trick and disarm.
